Spoiler:
The mc will kill the guy who cause all of this as you can see in the first two page of this doujinshi you can see the mc have a knife and he planning to kill the guy i don't know if he successful kill the guy because it's not show that he killed that guy but he probably will kill that guy if you realize what is the next chapter of last chapter it is the first two chapter of this doujinshi maybe i am wrong or not but the first two chapter is the next chapter of the final chapter that's all guys I can't wait to see if he really killed that guy or her mom stop him
Fuck this story line is curse
This is so amazing and freaking hot! Yeah this is hard NTR so be careful. I'm waiting so much for translate.
maybe i read a lot ntr, it was pretty boring and predictable ... great art as always

I wanted to say this, I'm Chinese, This epilogue was on another level of NTR, The original series was like a fantastic cake and this epilogue was a sweet topping to it. This epilogue is by far the HEAVIEST of all I read. I, not a fan of NTR nor vanilla, I fairly enjoy them from time to time. But this..... this is not for the weak-hearted, Those who trained to endure the NTR, not for you. Stay out. Even just for those ordinary, stay away. For those hardcore, this is a gem in our collection. To read this type, you cannot look at the perspective of the protagonist. That's all I'm going to say. Damn, This shit is hardcore. Always a fan since her first debut. Wish she would draw this similar style on a different plot. Vanilla, casual NTR for the ordinary reader. BUT once in a while, drop a bomb to spice thing up. Overall I love it but won't read it again.
We’re going to hell aren’t we
can we have an english version of this please
@Tony098 u seem to have slipped off into a different reality...
For English translation you should ask to, www.happycoffeestudio.wordpress.com, go check their website, they have a mail on it for people who want hentai translated
I wish you would die of coronavirus hanahook, your mind  really had dirty nastythought of relationship instead of smooth kind. You are alone and cuckholder who suffered because of your mother.
